mapper.sql: id, state, student_name, student_number, student_class, subject_name, subject_number, examination_score, examination_time, examination_rank, create_time
mapper.select:
select
from student_report where student_number = #{student_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (student_name like concat('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or student_number like concat('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or student_class like concat('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or subject_name like concat('%',#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) order by examination_score DESC

select
from student_report where student_number = #{student_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by examination_score DESC

select
from student_report where student_class = #{student_class,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by examination_score DESC

select
from student_report where subject_number = #{subject_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by examination_score DESC

select
from student_report order by examination_score DESC
